```{r setup, echo = FALSE, cache = FALSE, results = 'hide', include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
require(tidyverse)
require(kableExtra)
require(xaringanExtra)
options(
  htmltools.dir.version = FALSE, tibble.width = 60, tibble.print_min = 6,
  crayon.enabled = TRUE,
  knitr.kable.NA = ""
)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = FALSE,
	fig.align = "center",
	fig.height = 8.5,
	fig.path = "images/",
	fig.retina = 3,
	fig.show = "hold",
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE,
	cache = FALSE,
	comment = "#>",
	out.width = "100%"
)

```

```{r logo, echo=FALSE}
use_logo(
  image_url = "./images/mpidr_logo_colour_en_solo.png",
  exclude_class = c("hide_logo"),
  width = "60px"
)
```

## Slide with R code, output table formatted using KableExtra

```{r cars, echo = TRUE}
tibble(head(cars) * 1000) %>% 
  kable(format.args = list(big.mark = ","), caption='') %>% 
  kable_styling(font_size = 15) %>% 
  row_spec(c(2, 4), bold = T, color = "blue", background = "darkgray")
```
